SourceString:
Northern Free Trade Alliance:

A military and economic alliance of democratic, free market nations. These nations have consolidated their combined military and economic forces in ‘the pursuit of defending the rights and interests of free enterprise from foreign and internal threats’.

The NFTA is governed by a body of state and economic representatives. Every 8 years a member of this representative body will be elected Executive Chairmen by the vote of his or her peers. All representatives must be human citizens of an NFTA member state.

The Executive Chairman possesses the powers to: 
-Suggest legislation that is amended and voted on by the representative body. 
-Veto resolutions made by the representative body.
-Command NFTA military operations that are ratified by the representative body. 
-Sign executive orders during states of emergency. These orders can be vetoed in an emergency vote by two thirds of the representatives present at the time.

Eastern Defence Pact:
A military alliance consisting of east Euraskan nation states and various global protectorates. 
Since the war ended, relations with EDP member states have grown cold. 

Savlo Industries is one of few organizations that forms any bridge between eastern and western powers. However Savlo’s economic dealings with EDP states are largely kept a secret for the sake of military security.

The western most peninsula of the Euraskan Continent. 
A leading member state of the NFTA.
Home to one of the largest Eather mining and refining industries in Euraska.

Leading provider in Eather mining and refining.
Based in West Carcosa.
Owner and president: Edward Church. 
Member corporation of the NFTA.

Major technology research and development company owned by the Savlo family.
Operates in dozens of nations within both the NFTA and EDP.
Owner and President: Aidan Savlo.
Member corporation of the NFTA.

Savlo Industries is one of few organizations that forms any bridge between eastern and western powers. However Savlo’s economic dealings with EDP states are largely kept a secret for the sake of military security.

Major port city on the coast of West Carcosa.
Major export center of refined Eather and Eather products.

Small farming village east of Port Rale, on the south shore of Black Lake where it connects with Goldwood River, West Carcosa.
A local exporter of wheat and fresh produce.

Small village on the Redrook River, south-east of Port Rale, West Carcosa. 
Location of the Beauly Chemical Mill.

Small lake directly east of port Rale. 
Convergence point of 3 rivers (North River, Black River, & Goldwood River), leading out into the canals of Port Rale.

Discovered in the 1830’s, Eather is the most basic and fundamental building block of all matter and energy in the universe. 

In the late 1890’s Aiden Savlo discovered the scientific process of extracting, refining and applying Eather for industrial applications.

These applications include: 
-Material transmutation.
-Material and energy translation.
-Material reification. 
-Precise energy manipulation.
-Quantum manipulation.
-Synthetic petroleum production. 
-Expanded metabolic process. 
-Significant life-span extension.
-Potential applications in the reconstitution of dead organic material. 
-Various psionic and psychoactive applications.
-Psycho-material translation.
-Symmetrical psycho-material reification.

Needless to say these new technologies have been revolutionary for 20th century society and industry; most of all synthetic petroleum!

Major technology research and development company owned by the Savlo family.
Operates in dozens of nations within both the NFTA and EDP.
Owner and President: Aiden Savlo.
Member corporation of the NFTA.

Savlo Industries is one of few organizations that forms any bridge between eastern and western powers. However Savlo’s economic dealings with EDP states are largely kept a secret for the sake of military security.

Chemical storage and processing facility west of the village of Beauly, on the Redrook River. 
Jointly owned and operated by Standard Eather Company and Savlo Industries. 
Stores and processes Eather-derivatives and other associated materials.

Small village on the Redrook River, south-east of Port Rale, West Carcaso. 
Location of the Beauly Chemical Mill.

In his theory he proposes that extended Eather mining [REDACTED FOR YOUR SAFETY]

He goes on to elaborate that due to the theorized tidal forces of Eather on the “fabric of reality”,
[REDACTED FOR YOUR SAFETY] creating weak spots. These weak spots, once thought ideal for mining, [REDACTED FOR YOUR SAFETY].

[REDACTED FOR YOUR SAFETY]

He finally recommends that companies [REDACTED FOR YOUR SAFETY]

[REDACTED FOR YOUR SAFETY]

The NFTA’s official statement is that more research must be conducted before the scientific community attempts to publish its “opinions” on the matter. 

There is no reason for the public to be alarmed. Eather mining and refining is perfectly safe and sustainable and is in fact vital for the continuation of modern society. 

Our modern world simply could not exist without this industry and its benefactors.

I’ve collected a sample of the artifact to be sent to our colleagues up north.

Please remember to tell them the unlock code; I added it to the end of the retrieval document.

You can make a copy from the main lab terminal.

To all staff: 

If you need to get into the company Records office, you'll need to get Mr. Sheffield's assistance. 

After the recent layoffs, he is currently the only employee who has a key. 

Thank you!

Utility Tunnel No. 308:

Port Rale southern Freight Depot.



Standard Eather Co. Ground Pump Control Node.

STATUS: 83% ONLINE

DATA FEED: ONLINE

Looked like he was willing to play hardball, until we went for the tail...

After that he became very cooperative. Maybe he can even work off the rest of his debt...

This time I got my hands on one of those Insurrectionists. 

He broke down before we finished tying him to the fucking chair! 

Gave some spiel about their master, the human; says he's drinking people's blood 'n some shit.

Real weasel, trying to get out of his session early by making up stories. I'm going to take my time with him...

He broke quick, but he ain't coughing up anything useful.

Doesn't matter what we do to him; just keeps screaming about some horse on a beach.

Don't know what we should've expected; its not like the Broker is going to trust his secrets to some runner.

He's a waste of time, I dumped his body in the canal.

Here we got a little pinko girl. Scrappy one too.

I won't go into too much detail about this case; what she delivered is much more noteworthy. 

Turns out the big mamma has a big secret: 
She's sewn some sort of artifact into her own belly. Now it makes her "bulletproof".
Explains why nothing out here's been able to take the bitch out. 

Must be how she got the name "roach"...

WARNING: 

Prolonged down-time in-between activations of the Test Drill have been known to cause buildups in electro-static anomalies.

In order to safely maintain this equipment, engineers must first perform an electro-magnetic flush of the whole facility using the Turbo-Dynamo located in the lower machine rooms.
